message.body: Lol quick question. How much younger is your bf? I am seeing a much younger man for the first time and I need um..haha support or something
Bc I feel like it's a stupid idea and yet he's pursuing it really hard and he's pushing to make it serious and I'm like...whaaa!!!!!????
He is 31 I'm 36
We really need to catch up. I'm assuming things ended with last guy
Kind of feel like he's too young to know what he wants
Ha!! Yaaa this kid is 5 yrs younger!
We've been hooking up for a few weeks and he brought up wanting to be serious/exclusive and I said no Just bc i thought he'd regret it or something
But i adore him haha he's so cute
bECaUSe HES A ChIlD wHAt AM I DoInG OMg
5 yrs is magic number! All of the famously in love couples, that really lasted, was the female 5 yrs older
Awww
Hahahahahahaha omg thank you so much. This is what I needed to hear
For real
Bc everyone is telling me I'm an idiot except..I dunno it doesn't feel bad
Just go with it. You have "just gone" with much worse
Good!!!
See!!
It's fine!
Ahhhh. I want to see:)
It doesn't feel anxiety producing or anything. It feels really easy
My best friend Sofie said her grandfather fell in love and married her grandma when he was 20 and she was 30!! And they stayed together til they were very old
Until she died actually
Man I dunno thank you. This helps hahahaha
Dude he's the cutest man in the universe
You deserve the best
Oh. Wow!!!!
I also love that dog
You deserve it. That's why you should trust it
ï¿¼
Like he's...insanely cute
I keep feeling like I'm on candid camera and a bitter ex is pulling a horrible prank on me
Um ya he's beautiful and kind and amazing and that's why I don't trust it LoL
Hahaha ya!! Me too!! Haha k thank you so much. You typed exactly what I wanted to read lol
It all comes a round. You are a wonderful and beautiful person, of course an amazing guy is going to fall for you.
I'm sorry
Oh and ya things ended w connor bc he's an alcoholic. It was sad actually. I ended up blocking him...
Bc I felt manipulated
Lots of promises he'd work on his drinking and lots of second chances
Lots of begging for another chance and saying he loved me bla bla
You gave it a shot. I'm glad you stayed level-headed
Yes. It is best. He knows that
And I just felt manipulated so I ended up cutting him out cold turkey. Blocked him and never talked to him again and now I feel awful about it but I had to do it for my emotional health
Yeah I def don't regret it. He's def an alcoholic and needs to be in rehab and be monitored and I don't want to date or marry someone w that kind of problem obv
:) k night thank you so much lol
This was really really helpful
Lol I'm like...hooking up w a 23 yr old mega cutie omg
Oh yeah!!!
I'm 28
Hehehe
You are so young
Heheh I was dating age appropriate men tho: 26-36 age range
Whatever
Spencer and James were 26 and even that seemed younger or quaver
Whatever
Heehehehe buuut 23 Heehehehe omg he's so pretty it's painful so painful
I've done that and it's been great:) Tarek was 5 years younger than me and it was the best ever, before josh.
Omg thank you. Sofie said same thing. I'm dating to other men, one 25!! And one 32
And my logic says I should ditch the 23 yr old for the other two
So you're fine
But like....
Go with your gut
I really like him best by far and not just bc he's so pretty
I mean only if it's what you really feel
I like him best bc I think we have similar personalities and space-y outlooks. I feel most comfortable w him
Don't over think it and see what happens as time goes. With all of them
Ok!!!! Thanks!!!
Can't wait to see you sometime soon. So much to catch up and just hanging out
Are you working at the gallery on first Friday? I would love to come back to philly for that
Awesome! I'll try to come in for it if you aren't too busy that night to host me
Yes! I'm also def gallery hopping; I did it last ff w my ex James and some art history phd candidates from temple funny enough and it was Reaallly fun!
Send me your address so I can mail you a check out in morning
I have the most amazing roommates
Awesome!
I'll send you a check tomorrow
Do you think, if I pay for shipping you could send me painting? Maybe without frame then?
Or maybe I can get it Thursday or first Friday
